documents.document: @fastercamels he was a worthy opponent. I wouldn't bet against him on clay if he performs at a similar level to the past fortnight.
Amazing tournament. Sad it's over. Bring on the next Grand Slam.
@TheMyrka first person I've heard say that.
@fastercamels @ddiamond maybe it will be American Sniper
Well done Venus Williams what an achievement making the final all these years later. You can hold your head high. Gave Serena a good game.
@ShaneHarmon @WestpacStadium @WellySevens @gunsnroses just got my GnR tickets this week thanks to reading the stadium newsletter!
@TEGDAINTY hey guys do you happen to have a media publicist contact for the Wellington show next Thursday? Feel free to PM.
BeIn Sports have actually been a joke in New Zealand. Wish they'd just on sold the rights to PLP or someone who has Kiwis best interests!
I don't think they're massively similar, but I keep comparing Hidden Figures to The Imitation Game when describing it. Fair comparison?
@Tegal1234 a case study in terrible service
Also saw SPLIT this week. A return to form for M.Night Shyamalan. James McAvoy pulls off a hugely complex character. https://t.co/4VUmoprfiu
Saw Hidden Figures last night and it was fantastic! An inspiring true story with a wonderful score. Seek it out NZ! https://t.co/3xcpXYSmXA
@sbrookbrooks good variety though!
@RikkiSwannell Raonic struggling with illness though I heard? Would need to be at the peak of his powers to stand a chance I reckon.
@beINSPORTS_NZ @KloppGoff also signed up for a months free trial and it never worked once. Absolutely appalling service needs investigating.
@Tegal1234 it seems like all they care about are those watching it live! Which for New Zealand is practically nobody.
@raysubers seeing it on Monday here in NZ, very excited.
Here we go, @WgtnPhoenixFC aiming for a third home win in a week against @brisbaneroar. More @ALeague action! https://t.co/H0rCYFY7MZ
@Tegal1234 can't remember the last time I saw the Phoenix in good weather in Wellington. Certainly not this season
Saturday night on Rod Laver looks terrible @AustralianOpen what are they thinking? Day holders get Nadal/Serena. Night? 22 v 12 & 15 v 18
@Tegal1234 @WgtnPhoenixFC second on the Churros they are amazing
What do the Phoenix bring to the A League again?!
Easily the best Phoenix performance of the season to date. Finally living up to their potential!
@Dale_Warburton on Valentine's Day how romantic
@pineyzb @WgtnPhoenixFC Krishna in for Barbarouses for me. He was awful on Saturday and hasn't impressed all season for my opinion.
Finally saw SING today as well. Not as good as Moana. But not terrible by any stretch. An animated animal American Idol style affair.
Just watched the first episode of Lemony Snicket and Chewing Gum on Netflix. That's this weeks television viewing taken care of.
@tuplski nothing really happens but it's so beautiful. So raw and real.
No Apple phone chargers available in the Mezzanine lounge? @WestpacStadium @ShaneHarmon
Derby have a tough run of games. Norwich and Leeds away done, now time for Reading at home then Ipswich and Newcastle away ðŸ˜’ bring on Feb 5.
@JaffaRef can't believe your mad chairman hasn't de-railed you at all. Bartley is quality. Hernandez and Roofe ran rings round Hanson.
@JaffaRef all the Kiwis here love it when Chris Wood scores. Don't think I'll be getting much sympathy. You look good this season.
Don't understand McLaren. Why didn't Hughes start? Camara and De Sart did well in the cup but they were a huge let down tonight.
Well that was a terrible start to my Super Sporting Saturday. Thanks Chris Wood. Hate Leeds. On to the Basin Reserve for NZ v Bangladesh.
You can't beat Wellington on a good day etc. https://t.co/mWNw445Lgp
@MeslootHozil but I came to auckland for four days over xmas hoping for beach weather and it was soooo overcast and muggy.
@MeslootHozil don't worry I'll post pictures when it happens. This has been an unseasonably poor December and January so far though ðŸ˜’
@MeslootHozil we get them. Once every 50 days maybe but still. You'll never hear the end of it on here when we do have one!
@Tegal1234 thanks! Big stop at The Backbencher. Guessing the times are just estimates?
Has anyone kept up with HOMELAND? Loved the first two series but I've fallen way behind and not sure whether to catch up.
@danslevin fair enough. Did you manage to catch Manchester by the Sea before Xmas with Fences? Is it as good as the awards hype suggests?
@Tegal1234 @jojokempson @The_Nighthawks where's the info on 12 pubs? On yellow fever forums?
@jojokempson @Tegal1234 @The_Nighthawks as long as we get play on Saturday I'll be happy. Sporting double header with Blackcaps then Nix.
@danslevin nice Kiwi connection too with Miranda Harcourt working on it as an acting coach. Is it similar to Philomena?
I was not here in 2009. But I was in Lille last July when Wales beat Belgium in the quarter final of Euro 2016. Incredible underdog success.
Journalists whinging about the World Cup in NZ: you won't be complaining when you get to go and cover it because NZ are there. Same for fans
@patrick478 ahh that could be a bit of a problem going forward for them (and the Phoenix if they remain in the A-League long term).
@patrick478 also imagine how good it would be if this expansion saw more money go to our Oceania neighbours and more competitive qualifiers?
@patrick478 they have the A League going for them though. Who knows if NZ could develop more professional teams or a league via WC cash?
@patrick478 do you think being at World Cups more regularly would lead to us being able to attract more and better friendlies?
@patrick478 surely if they saw their own countries players at a World Cup finals that will inspire them even more? I can be like Chris Wood!
@patrick478 for the future though young kids might be more likely to get into the sport and choose it over others? More money for our game?
@patrick478 good point qualifying is devalued now as 32 countries pretty much know they'll make every single World Cup now
I love how a scrappy 1-0 win over Bahrain is the main argument for NZ fans unhappy that they'll know get to go to every World Cup finals.
With 80 games now requiring at least 12 stadiums, maybe New Zealand might even get to co-host with Australia one day. #fifaworldcup
Just imagine what could be done by the extra windfall and interest in the sport New Zealand Football will get as a result of WC expansion.
@SimonHampton9 @NewshubNZ the expansion can only strengthen New Zealand football. Commercially and on the pitch.
@SWTGallagher the first couple of occasions it's going to be exciting. Especially because as a low ranked nation we should play big names.
@MsKateRodger @NewshubNZ good to see I, Daniel Blake getting recognition! Surprised A United Kingdom was completely snubbed.
@SWTGallagher New Zealand aren't even close to the top 48 in the rankings though. Plus casual Kiwis are more likely to watch a WC with NZ in
@Tegal1234 if Asia has 6.5 spots why would Australia want to leave that?
New Zealand football fans need to stop crying and get over it. You're almost guaranteed to go to EVERY World Cup now! That's incredible!
@Tegal1234 obviously great as an occasion in terms of NZ qualify. But Bahrain at the Westpac to qualify or Germany/Brazil at a World Cup?
@Tegal1234 Difficult one to discuss really. When you get a Mexico here or maybe Argentina it's great. But Bahrain or Peru? Not so great.
@Tegal1234 with 48 teams hopefully we get a group where we have a chance of qualifying thereby getting 3 games+
@Tegal1234 agreed, it's strange it saying 12th-16th January but then not having the 16th on offer for purchase.
@Tegal1234 @BlacksCaps At the end of Day 4 they will decide whether to make entry free or not for Day 5. Since it's Bangladesh maybe only 3!
@Tegal1234 @BlacksCaps it's a 5 day test but NZ Cricket is following lead of other countries by only selling first 4 days in advance.
Didn't catch the Golden Globes. So pleased that Moonlight is getting a cinematic release in NZ next week. Excited to see that and Fences.
@ShaneHarmon @AFL @BBL @sportingintel is AFL helped by having finals though? Something which La Liga, the EPL and Bundesliga don't have?
Now I'm awake after that 5 magnitude shake #eqnz
@FPLPriceChanges seriously thinking about it, I've been burned by Son a few times this season bringing him in and out. Might try Eriksen.
@FPLPriceChanges neither, got Pedro, Walcott, Mane in midfield. Lukaku and Costa up front.
@FPLPriceChanges I was thinking Coutinho or Pogba
@FPLPriceChanges I have Mane to get rid of for the next game week but don't wanna risk replacement getting injured. Any top suggestions?
@danslevin similar for my football teams over the last four days. Derby/Phoenix 0, Other Teams 3. Two 0-0 draws but still a let down.
@TheMyrka in the UK they often have an extra session after that as well (especially on Fridays and Saturdays!)
@KloppGoff @AIUnderPressure great stat! Gulf between the top six and the rest this season is huge. Quite concerning but good for title race.
@rickygervais New Zealand please Ricky. Wellington TSB Arena or Auckland Vector Arena thanks.
@KermodeMovie @wendyide @guardian it's no wonder Paramount already took a huge $75m write down on the film.
@CapnCassidy @Tegal1234 we were the only A League side to take a chance on him and our manager converted him to a striker which helped Oz.
@CapnCassidy @Tegal1234 sorry I forgot Nathan Burns was a regular international before he came to the Phoenix.
@SimonHampton9 I thought it looked like 4,000 and I was being generous with that estimate tbh. Including all members regardless perhaps?
@Tegal1234 also think it's bullshit. Looking around I'd say 4k at best
@MeslootHozil its got progressively worse as the games gone on. Not looking forward to the walk home!
This is the single most boring game of football I've ever been to #WELvADL #aleague
Watching Robbie Williams live at Big Ben on the BBC is a great way to start 2017. Happy New Year
@Dale_Warburton kids go free might push it to 6k hopefully
@tuplski what haven't you seen from this year?
@KloppGoff @pineyzb @SnakeMcHardy @A_Dura22 @footycentralnz @CapFootball @LFCWellington all registered, would take a few mates easily too.
@KloppGoff @pineyzb @SnakeMcHardy @A_Dura22 @footycentralnz @CapFootball @LFCWellington so keen for this, we have to get them to NZ!
@patrick478 we sometimes get the big international spectacles passing through, most just go to Auckland now (Wicked, Mary Poppins etc)
@patrick478 if it's anything like the west end version I saw in July (im sure it is) it's just epic. The costumes, sets, pyro, carpet etc.
@PaulIfill I get where you're coming from and would be inclined to agree. A new coach hasn't really got time to do anything this season.
RIP George Michael. Fantastic British pop star. Superb greatest hits. Only 53.
Fingers crossed for better weather in Auckland tomorrow! Grateful for no rain but let's get rid of that cloud and wind please.
Thanks for ruining my trip out to Orewa @2degreesmobile I lost out on the golden pin because your app said lets go then 'too far' then grey.
@BR4DY booked your Vegas hotel yet? I forgot to add my thoughts when I saw you asking about it on FB!
@sbrookbrooks also love The Riddle of the Model
@FlicksNZ I had six of the top ten in my own list on @wgtnaccessradio
